nodes.text: A Dark Acolyte, also called a Sith acolyte, was a title held by Asajj Ventress and Savage Opress during their time under Count Dooku. A Dark Acolyte had commanding authority over forces in the Confederacy military.
Dooku did take on another apprentice, Quinlan Vos, although the Count of Serenno told Vos that he was to be a Dark Lord of the Sith.
